original_title: Der Verrückte, das Herz und das Auge
overview: Inspired by the Edgar Allan Poe story "The Tell-Tale Heart," this is the story of Ed, a middle-aged nervous-laughing insane man who lives in his family manor, and of his plans to murder his elderly demented father and dispose of the corpse.

production_companies.name: Hochschule für Film und Fernsehen 'Konrad Wolf'

title: The Tell-Tale Heart
